com.github.fedorchuck.developers_notification.json

Class Json

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fedorchuck.developers_notification.json.Json

  • public class Json
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains method for serialise and deserialize. The main conversion API is defined in JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.

    Author: Volodymyr Fedorchuk

    Since:
    0.2.0

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode(java.lang.Object obj)
                               throws JsonEncodeException
        Convert inputting object to JSON string
        Parameters:
        obj - to convert
        Returns:
        JSON as string
        Throws:
        JsonEncodeException - if the input Object cannot be converted to JSON structure (or has other mismatch issues)
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • decodeValue

        public static <T> T decodeValue(java.lang.String str,
                                java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                         throws JsonDecodeException
        Convert inputted JSON to expected result
        Type Parameters:
        T - expected result type
        Parameters:
        str - JSON as string for mapping
        clazz - expected result class
        Returns:
        instance of expected type with deserialize JSON value
        Throws:
        JsonDecodeException - if the input JSON structure does not match structure expected for result type (or has other mismatch issues)
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • decodeValue

        public static <T> T decodeValue(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                         throws JsonDecodeException
        Convert inputted JSON to expected result
        Type Parameters:
        T - expected result type
        Parameters:
        inputStream - JSON as InputStream for mapping
        clazz - expected result class
        Returns:
        instance of expected type with deserialize JSON value
        Throws:
        JsonDecodeException - if the input JSON structure does not match structure expected for result type (or has other mismatch issues)
        Since:
        0.2.0
